title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Message Type
content: You can set different types by type. The options are success, warning, info, and error. The default value is info.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Automatic shutdown delay
content: You can set the delay for automatic shutdown through the duration attribute. The default value is 4500 ms.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Display position
content: You can set the position of the notification box through the position attribute. The default value is bottom-right.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Title
content: You can set the title of the notification box through the title attribute.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Custom Content
content: You can set the content of the notification box through the message attribute.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: The close button is not displayed.
content: showClose message: indicates whether the notification box displays the close button. The default value is true.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: The type icon is not displayed.
content: You can use the showIcon attribute to set whether to display the type icon in the notification box. The default value is true.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Custom Close Icon
content: You can set the icon for closing the notification box through the closeIcon attribute. The default value is IconClose.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Custom type icon
content: You can set the notification box type icon through the statusIcon attribute. The default value is IconInfoSolid.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Event triggered before the notification box is closed
content: You can set the event before the notification box is closed through the beforeClose attribute.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: This event is triggered when the close button is clicked.
content: You can set the onClose attribute to trigger an event when the close button is clicked.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.

title: Configure image stabilization
content: You can use debounceDelay to set the image stabilization time.
findIntroStr: Notify notification, which is mainly used for pop-up prompts.
